about_the_game:
Expand your eerie adventure with the new DLC for "Mystical Riddles: Haunted Portraits," where deeper mysteries and more chilling secrets await! Delve into four additional locations, each brimming with unique challenges and dense with atmospheric puzzles, brain teasers, and hidden objects. This expansion not only broadens the enigmatic world of Oliver Cook’s gallery but also offers you a chance to uncover new details about key characters and confront their darkest secrets. Push your detective skills to their limits as you navigate through intricate new storylines and terrifying revelations!

This DLC not only enhances the game with new layers of puzzles and exploration but also deepens the narrative, allowing players to explore the backstories and secrets of the enigmatic characters they’ve grown to question.

🧩 DISCOVER OLIVER'S SECRETS!
Investigate the cluttered bar counter where recent activity suggests Oliver’s untold stories lie amidst scattered notes and papers. Piece together his mysterious past and uncover what drives his unsettling work.

🧩 UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY OF THE DARK SPIRIT!
Venture into a gloomy forest that attracts spirits and echoes with the whispers of the departed. Solve cryptic riddles and gather information about the dark spirit haunting the woods to safeguard your journey through the supernatural.

🧩 SALVAGE LOST SOULS!
Explore the library’s shadowy corners where ghosts linger and secrets hide. Search behind cabinets and among the ancient tomes to uncover crucial information on how to save these tormented souls.

🧩 EXPOSE ROXY'S SECRET DEAL!
Enter a bustling photo shoot room filled with sets and costumes. Work through the puzzles embedded in the elaborate camera setups and uncover the truth behind Roxy’s sudden rise to fame.

Each new setting is meticulously designed with its own unique aesthetic and narrative depth, offering fresh environments packed with unseen challenges and hidden lore!
